name: Super Mighty Ultra Ball
description:
Demo Available!

Super Mighty Ultra Ball is an action-packed brick-breaking extravaganza with plenty of style and filled with heart-pounding fun. Smash your way through colorful levels on your way to ultimate brick-breaking, ball-flying domination!

Super Mighty Ultra Ball is a throwback to the incredible brick-breaking games of the past, but updated for modern times.  Attack the bricks using a variety of upgrades that help you cause chaos and destruction.

Watch with glee as explosions tear the bricks apart.  Juggle high-speed balls on their mission of destruction while increasing your score multiplier on your way to those highly coveted three-star ratings!

All of this in glorious high definition!

There is a demo available that includes the first five levels of each board pack included in the full game.

Note: This game is in early access.  Features are subject to change.  You will probably encounter bugs and might come across something that's unfinished.  Feedback and bug reports are appreciated.  Email feedback@hrlrdigital.com with your comments.

There are currently 75 levels across 3 board packs, but this is planned to be at least 150 levels across 6 board packs before release.  If you buy the full version now, you will get access to all the board packs included in the release.

History:

Early Access v2 - Nov. 23, 2017

  • Added third board pack "Fire & Ice"
  • Fixed "Level Complete" sound playing on Game Over
  • Minor internal memory access bugs and optimizations
